titleStmt.title: West and East doorjambs of false southern door of Preah Ko (K. 312), 801 Śaka

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: Alternance between the two forms kvanna and kvan· throughout the inscription. kvan· appears for the first time in line E13.
The double-haste ra sometimes get confused with pa.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: finishing translation of the inscription and adding bibliography
started initial encoding of the inscription

div.p:
Western Doorjamb
mu vrahey· I sī bhavakṣara I sī kandeṅ· I sī vinayavara I sī kñuṁ vraḥ I sī
cpoṅ· I sī cpoṅ· sot· I sī vajraśūra I sī kaṁvai I gvāl· kmau I gvāl· kanso I
gvāl· saṁAp· I tai kañjuṅ· I tai pau panlas· I lap· dayā I tai kan·As· I sī pau kanra
t· I tai rat· kañcū I tai kaṁvr̥k· I tai pau kaṁprvat· I tai rat· vrau I lap· tmai I tai kaṁpi

tai subhāśriya I tai kaṁpuy· I tai kaṁpas· I tai pau saṁAp· I tai kaṁvai I tai lakṣmīdeva I
tai kaṁpas· I .

mu śivabhāva I sī knoc· I sī kaṁpit· I sī kansāt· I sī rāja I
sī saṁAp· I sī cumvala I sī śrī I sī śikhāteja I gvāl· Uttara I gvāl· mānudharmma I tai
tmyaṅ· I tai pit mau I sī pau krau I sī rat· saṁAp· I tai kañjā I tai pau kaṁvai I tai pansvaṁ I

n·In· I .

t· 9 tai rat· 4 sī pau 5 tai pau 7 savāla 100 40 10 8 .

Eastern Doorjamb
nu dalmakka nu turyya vnas·
kamrateṅ· Añ· miśrabhoga nu ka
mrateṅ· Añ· indradevī. ye pava nārikā I kvann·
nna ye I ye tval· pāna I ye pavanārikā sau
ye slā I kvanna jmol· I ye I ye slā chau I kvanna jmol· I

div.p: Liste de 1 mu, 8 sī, 3 gvāl, 14 tai, 3 tai pau, 2 lap, 2 sī pau, 2 tai rat, 1 sī rat. mu Vrahey 1 ; sī Bhavakṣara 1 ; sī Kandeṅ 1 ; sī Vinayavara 1 ; sī Kñuṁ Vraḥ 1 ; sī Cpoṅ 1 ; sī Cpoṅ additionnel 1 ; sī Vajraśūra 1 ; sī Kaṁvai 1 ; gvāl Kmau 1 ; gvāl Kanso 1 ; gvāl Saṁqap 1 ; tai Kañjuṅ 1 ; tai pau Panlas 1 ; lap Dayā 1 ; tai Kanqas 1 ; sī pau Kanrat 1 ; tai rat Kañcū 1 ; tai Kaṁvr̥k 1 ; tai pau Kaṁprvat 1 ; tai rat Vrau 1 ; lap Tmai 1 ; tai Kaṁpit 1 ; tai Samqap 1 ; tai Cpoṅ 1 ; tai Vraḥ Kalpa 1 ; sī pau qAṁdeṅ 1 ; sī rat Panlas 1 ; tai Kañjir 1 ; tai Subhāśriya 1 ; tai Kaṁpuy 1 ; tai Kaṁpas 1 ; tai pau Saṁqap 1 ; tai Kaṁvai 1 ; tai Lakṣmīdeva 1 ; tai Kaṁpas 1.

Total : 1 dvaṅ, 4 mu, 37 sī, 13 gvāl, 68 tai, 10 lap, 9 sī rat, 4 tai rat, 5 sī pau, 7 tai pau ; en comptant les enfants : 158.
